translations: n.伪证者；[法] 作伪证者；伪誓者

phrs.translation: 伪誓者, 作伪证者, 伪证者, 犯伪证罪者

sentences.sentence: During the rest of the time, I got a title "the Infamous Perjurer Twain" on this paper.
sentences.translation: 剩下的时间里，我在报纸上找到了一个叫《臭名昭著的伪证者吐温》的标题。
看看这位声名狼藉的伪证犯！

sentences.sentence: Gentile subscribed it reluctantly, but in the upshot he was condemned and imprisoned as a perjurer.
sentences.translation: 詹蒂莱订阅它不情愿，但结果他谴责和监禁的作伪证者。
